Name: Enigmatis 2: The Mists of Ravenwood
About the game: Enigmatis: The Mists of Ravenwood is a critically-acclaimed, beautifully crafted casual adventure game rich with horror, plot twists and shadowy intrigue. Follow the trail of a demonic preacher and unravel the secrets shrouded in the mists of Ravenwood Park! What happened to the abandoned camper covered by enormous claw marks? What lurks in the park’s shadows? Will you be able to solve the mystery? Features 36 achievements to unlock 30 collectibles (butterflies) to find Bonus Adventure: “The Redeemed Memories” is a prequel to the main one. Witness the origins of Ravenwood Park, and rescue your friends from the evil dwelling within. 55 stunning, hand drawn locations and graphics with many animated details Exciting detective story rich with horror elements and plot twists Atmospheric soundtrack Picturesque setting of Ravenwood Park Evidence Board: draw conclusions based on evidence and clues
